results.title: Carry on Dick
results.creator_credit: Gerald Thomas, Peter Rogers and Rank Organisation Film Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Carry on”.
The 26th ‘Carry on’ film is one of mistaken identities and secret lives. Highwayman Dick Turpin - Big Dick (Sid James), is also the town rector, ably supported by Harry and Tom (Barbara Windsor and Peter Butterworth) - his parlour maid and the man who pumps the church’s organ. There is only one weak link in the chain - a noticeable birthmark on Turpin’s privates which will require the assistance of a bevy of busty women to bring to light. The charge will be led by Captain Fancy and Jock Strap. Cast also includes Kenneth Williams, Hattie Jacques, Bernard Bresslaw and Joan Sims.

results.title: Follow that bird
results.creator_credit: Ken Kwapis, Tony Garnett and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Big Bird goes to stay with the Dodo family in Illinois, but soon realizes he really belongs with the variety of inhabitants on Sesame Street. Adapted from the very popular children’s television series, “Sesame Street”, this wonderful muppet film features Oscar, Bert, Ernie, Cookie Monster and many of the other loved characters from the television show. Delightful entertainment for all the family. Stars Chevy Chase, Sandra Bernhard, Waylon Jennings, Dave Thomas and John Candy in cameo roles and the voices of Carroll Spinney, Jim Henson, Frank Oz, Paul Bartel and others.

results.title: Carry on up the Khyber
results.creator_credit: Gerald Thomas, Peter Rogers, Peter Rogers Productions and Rank Film Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Carry on”.
It is 1895 and the British occupation of India is threatened by revolutionary uprisings. In order for the revolutionaries to attack the British troops they need to cross the notorious Khyber Pass. The history and politics of the British Raj, however, is simply a convenient background for the Carry On team to conduct their regular mix of hilarious slap-stick and tongue-in-cheek camp. Cast includes Sidney James, Kenneth Williams, Joan Sims and a large supporting cast of British comedians.

results.title: Carry on abroad: or, what a package: or, it's all in: or, Swiss hols in the snow
results.creator_credit: Gerald Thomas, Peter Rogers and Rank Organisation Film Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Carry on”.
The 23rd “Carry on” film finds a gang of prim and proper British tourists on a disastrous holiday. This is despite the reassuring name of the tour organisers and their location - Wundatours on a package tour of the Paradise island of Elsbels on the Costa Plonka. Their dreams of a luxury hotel quickly disintegrate when they discover the hotel is still being built, there’s faulty wiring, a leaky roof, all staff look suspiciously alike and there’s a disgruntled cook. Add to this the usual carry on shenanigans surrounding beds and showers and we are in for a holiday like no other. Cast includes Sidney James, Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey, Joan Sims, Bernard Bresslaw, Barbara Windsor, Kenneth Connor and Hattie Jacques.

results.title: Folk song fantasy
results.creator_credit: Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Animated puppets and paper cut-outs enact the narratives contained in three folk songs sung by Emma Caslor: “THE RIDDLE SONG”, “WHO KILLED COCK ROBIN ?”, and “THE COOPER OF FIFE”. Animation by Alma Duncan; photography by Lyle Enright.

results.title: Recycled reflections
results.brief_description: A non-narrated film which first emphasises the potentially great waste in the single product, automobile bumpers, by exploring the piles of twisted discards. It then follows the process of transforming the damaged bumpers into good-as-new ones. Shows the recycling process from the heavy machines used to straighten the major dents and twists through hand-hammering, grinding, polishing and electro-plating. Finally, the transformed bumpers, indistinguishable from newly made ones, are plastic wrapped and stored awaiting use on new cars.

results.title: Carry on doctor (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Gerald Thomas, Peter Rogers and Rank Organisation Film Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Carry on”.
Britain’s favourite comedy team “carry on” as they only know how! “Carry on Doctor” looks at life in a country hospital when the patients revolt against the staff. Hattie Jacques is the fearsome Matron, Kenneth Williams the cold-hearted Doctor Tinkle, while Sid James as the malingerer Mr. Roper, takes a vacation in hospital. A madcap romp of bandages and stethoscopes, Frankie Howard as Mr. Bigger hams it up while Charles Hawtrey gives an unforgettable performance as an expectant father suffering all the symptoms of pregnancy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gerald Thomas, Peter Rogers and Rank Organisation Film Productions

results.title: Folk art: the Diana Brandt way
results.brief_description: Nationally renowned folk artist Diana Brandt brings her expertise, handy hints and experience to help you create traditional Bavarian Folk Art for your home. The equipment needed to complete two projects is shown and explained. The three strokes that comprise folk art are demonstrated clearly, simply and step-by-step so that you may practice to perfection at your own pace in your home. Includes scores of hints and shortcuts. Project One is a beautiful oval storage box with a delightfully rustic antique flower arrangement painted on the cover. Project Two is a teapot stand with a simple baroque design.

results.title: Focus on wonderland
results.creator_credit: Hawley Lawrence, Russ McCaig, Steve Bridge and FilmFair
results.brief_description: A couple spend a day in Los Angeles visiting movie lots, shops, markets and the beach. Later they visit the famed night spots of the city. Without commentary, this film uses natural sound and popular music.

results.title: Follow you follow me
results.brief_description: Examines the complexities in the friendship of two teenage boys - one a shy thirteen year old whose father owns a factory, and the other a confident extrovert whose father is an employee and shop steward at this same factory. An industrial dispute directly affects this friendship and the intensity of their feelings is revealed.
